meta_description: Discover how Red Skelton came from humble beginnings to become one of America's greatest comedians on the big screen. This fun museum located in Vincennes, Indiana is chocked full of action-packed exhibits great for the whole family. Get ready for your visit by checking out our upcoming events, admission, and group prices.
